topic.title: Seems not too many Japanese here
コロナウイルスについて、今みんなはどうしましか？
topic.body:
日本語が下手です、英語を使っていいでしょうか？
How's everything going in your city in Japan? So far you guys have done greatly compare to other countries.

1535081918_1rYi49f3DNfJntyt2EV3H1xjpVobJ.body:
別に
日本語も少しだけにできます

> [takusun](#comment_3_1RWL1R7ok78qpQpgYYyKUtzJm2MH8dYX3): I guess...People thinking "This is darkweb. This is criminal."and difficult to use this. [...]

Never worry about your english as long as I understand you. Nice talking to you. :)

1531894785_1GBdirCAbWZ5tUyqwKGcCwuXttJoY.body:
> [tnx](#comment_1_15nbwLuJ6kDNLoZmJS7oMxWi2bLdZ9Ekjz): ウアコワッ

Sorry what does the word mean

1551104267_1BPEnvRzwM3LQt8tc1o4vbPZh91kc.body:
Why are you here?
なぜここにきましたか
